questions.question: An epileptic attack can be induced in a normal person by means of?

answers.b: Walking along the road during sunny day

questions.question: The EEG signals are originated from the
The ranges of frequency and voltage related to EEG are

answers.a: 0.5 Hz to 100 Hz and 10 µV to 100 µV
answers.b: DC to 10 kHz and 10 µV to 1000 µV
answers.c: 0 to 1000 kHz and 0.1 mV to few mV
answers.d: 20 Hz to 100 Hz and 0 to few mV

questions.question: A continuous signal analysis over long periods of time can be performed by frequency analysis with the aid of
Recording of the peripheral nerves action potentials is called
